document.full_text: u.s. stocks advanced on thursday as optimism about upcoming earnings and investor buying of the quarter's top performers lifted the s&p 500 above a key technical level.
document.title: earnings hope lifts stocks, s&p above key resistance
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks advanced on thursday as optimism about upcoming earnings and investor buying of the quarter's top performers lifted the s&p 500 above a key technical level.
